bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of ding 疔 , pin-illness, and jie 癤 , pimple. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xi er 枲 耳 quotes Ji ji fang 濟急方 : 萬應膏…治一切癰疽發背，無頭惡瘡，腫毒疔癤 , “The paste with a myriad of responses: It cures all obstruction- and impediment-illnesses with effusion of the back, malign sores without [pus] head, as well as swelling and poison associated with pin-illness with pimples ”.
